name: UBaseDynamicMeshComponent
doc: UBaseDynamicMeshComponent is a base interface for a UMeshComponent based on a UDynamicMesh.

bExplicitShowWireframe: If true, render the Wireframe on top of the Shaded Mesh
WireframeColor: Constant Color used when Override Color Mode is set to Constant
ConstantColor: Constant Color used when Override Color Mode is set to Constant
ColorSpaceMode:
Color Space Transform that will be applied to the colors stored in the DynamicMesh Attribute Color Overlay when
constructing render buffers.
Default is "No Transform", ie color R/G/B/A will be independently converted from 32-bit float to 8-bit by direct mapping.
LinearToSRGB mode will apply SRGB conversion, ie assumes colors in the Mesh are in Linear space. This will produce the same behavior as UStaticMesh.
SRGBToLinear mode will invert SRGB conversion, ie assumes colors in the Mesh are in SRGB space.
bEnableFlatShading: Enable use of per-triangle facet normals in place of mesh normals
bEnableViewModeOverrides:
This flag controls whether Editor View Mode Overrides are enabled for this mesh. For example, this controls hidden-line removal on the wireframe
in Wireframe View Mode, and whether the normal map will be disabled in Lighting-Only View Mode, as well as various other things.
Use SetViewModeOverridesEnabled() to control this setting in Blueprints/C++.
bEnableRaytracing:
Enable/disable Raytracing support on this Mesh, if Raytracing is currently enabled in the Project Settings.
Use SetEnableRaytracing() to configure this flag in Blueprints/C++.

methods.name: ClearOverrideRenderMaterial
methods.doc: Clear any active override render material

methods.name: ClearSecondaryRenderMaterial
methods.doc: Clear any active secondary render material

methods.name: GetColorOverrideMode
methods.doc: @return active Color Override mode

methods.name: GetConstantOverrideColor
methods.doc: @return active Color used for Constant Color Override Mode

methods.name: GetDynamicMesh
methods.doc: @return the child UDynamicMesh

methods.name: GetEnableRaytracing
methods.doc: @return true if raytracing support is currently enabled

methods.name: GetEnableWireframeRenderPass
methods.doc: @return true if wireframe rendering pass is enabled

methods.name: GetFlatShadingEnabled
methods.doc: @return active Color used for Constant Color Override Mode

methods.name: GetOverrideRenderMaterial
methods.doc: @return active override render material for the given MaterialIndex

methods.name: GetSecondaryBuffersVisibility
methods.doc: @return true if secondary buffers are currently set to be visible

methods.name: GetSecondaryRenderMaterial
methods.doc: @return active secondary render material

methods.name: GetVertexColorSpaceTransformMode
methods.doc: @return active Color Override mode

methods.name: HasOverrideRenderMaterial
methods.doc: @return true if an override render material is currently enabled for the given MaterialIndex

methods.name: SetColorOverrideMode
methods.doc: Configure the active Color Override

methods.name: SetConstantOverrideColor
methods.doc: Configure the Color used with Constant Color Override Mode

methods.name: SetEnableFlatShading
methods.doc: Configure the Color used with Constant Color Override Mode

methods.name: SetEnableRaytracing
methods.doc:
Enable/Disable raytracing support. This is an expensive call as it flushes
the rendering queue and forces an immediate rebuild of the SceneProxy.

methods.name: SetEnableWireframeRenderPass
methods.doc: Configure whether wireframe rendering is enabled or not

methods.name: SetOverrideRenderMaterial
methods.doc: Set an active override render material. This should replace all materials during rendering.

methods.name: SetSecondaryBuffersVisibility
methods.doc: Show/Hide the secondary triangle buffers. Does not invalidate SceneProxy.

methods.name: SetSecondaryRenderMaterial
methods.doc: Set an active secondary render material.

methods.name: SetVertexColorSpaceTransformMode
methods.doc: Configure the active Color Space Transform Mode
